articles.description: Reaction and analysis as Arsenal beat Real Madrid 3-0 in the first leg of the Champions League quarter-finals, plus build-up to Aston Villa v PSG.
articles.title: Champions League: Reaction to Arsenal's complete win over Real Madrid

articles.description: After 338 career games Declan Rice had never scored a free-kick, but fast forward 90 minutes and he has scored two - and on the biggest stage against Real Madrid in the Champions League.
articles.title: Declan Rice: Arsenal midfielder revels in free-kick magic against Real Madrid in Champions League

articles.description: Jude Bellingham sends a warning to Arsenal after his Real Madrid team are beaten 3-0 by the Gunners in their quarter-final first leg.
articles.title: Real Madrid need 'something crazy' to win Arsenal tie, says Jude Bellingham

articles.description: Another stunning assault for Lucknow Super Giants leaves West Indies left-hander Nicholas Pooran close to T20 batting perfection.
articles.title: IPL 2025: Nicholas Pooran nearing T20 batting perfection for Lucknow Super Giants

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler jokes about holding a cookery school at his Champions Dinner while also dealing with hayfever at Augusta National Golf Club.
articles.title: Masters 2025: Scottie Scheffler on Augusta National defence, Champions Dinner and hayfever

articles.description: Major League Baseball pays tribute to former players Octavio Dotel and Tony Blanco, who died in Tuesday's roof collapse at a nightclub in Santo Domingo.
articles.title: Major League Baseball pays tribute to former players Octavio Dotel and Tony Blanco in roof collapse

articles.description: Two-time champion Bernhard Langer says he will find saying goodbye to Augusta National "emotional" as he plays in his 41st and final Masters.
articles.title: The Masters 2025: Bernhard Langer preparing for Augusta farewell

articles.description: Legendary tennis player and social equality advocate Billie Jean King receives a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame.
articles.title: Billie Jean King receives Hollywood Walk of Fame star

articles.description: The Cleveland Cavaliers secure top spot in the Eastern Conference with a 135-113 victory over the Chicago Bulls.
articles.title: NBA results: Cleveland Cavaliers beat Chicago Bulls to secure top spot in Eastern Conference

articles.description: Grand National runner Celebre d'Allen dies aged 13 following his collapse at Aintree's final fence on Saturday.
articles.title: Celebre d'Allen: Grand National horse dies after collapse at Aintree
